Job Description: Develop and ship features from end-to-end. We spend a lot of time thinking through building new features, but the goal is always for the implementation to be maintainable, not for it to be "pure."* Implement data import using Node.js to PostgreSQL* Implement user interfaces in React and NextJS* Implement mobile apps in React Native* Implement backend API in Laravel* Work with our team to engineer new growth initiatives.* Write lots of tests.
